channel.title: I cant run a 508 client, this is what it says
channel.description:
error: signlink:233 signlink:372 applet_sub1:338 client:22194 java.lang.runtime exception
what do i need to do?/do i need to add something?

item.title: I cant run a 508 client, this is what it says
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“menaru, post:2, topic:235894”]Well one reason why people quit using 508 clients is for this matter. You have corrupt server files mate they don’t work proper with your client, All 508 clients can only load if it detects a valid 508 server. Try to get a valid one.[/quote]stfu if you dunno what your talking about, find a 508 cache and download it to C:/ it will tell you where ever you find the cache what folder to put it in, search 508 cache, i had the same error not its gone

Thanks, Barrage

Read full topic
item.source: I cant run a 508 client, this is what it says

item.title: I cant run a 508 client, this is what it says
item.dc:creator: @menaru menaru
item.description:
@menaru wrote:

Well one reason why people quit using 508 clients is for this matter. You have corrupt server files mate they don’t work proper with your client, All 508 clients can only load if it detects a valid 508 server. Try to get a valid one.

Read full topic
